## Lexical databases  in `lexicoR`

`lexicoR` contains two lexical databases, [DeepLex](http://dx.doi.org/10.6129%2fCJP.201909_61(3).0004) and [Chinese Lexical Database](http://www.chineselexicaldatabase.com).
